nodes.text: During the Galactic Civil War, the Stone Grotto dinner club on the planet Bothawui was overseen by a maitre d', who welcomed a group of undercover Alliance Intelligence operatives to the restaurant in the year 3.5 ABY.

The adventure notes that the Stone Grotto has a strict dress code and that the maitre d' will offer the players a suitable jacket, tie, or scarf to wear if they arrive at the restaurant improperly clothed. The articles of clothing will not fit, but the players will not be allowed to enter if they do not put them on.
